name: FRESHPOWPOW
description:
FRESHPOWPOW is a prototype game I've been tinkering around with on and off for ages.

It's kind of based on the old Win95 game SkiFree. I really liked how the snowboarder looked in that game, and thought it would be cool if there was a snowboarding equivalent of SkiFree, so this my crack at making it.

Controls with just the arrow keys:

Left and Right to spin

Up to Skid Stop.
